name: Premium Wireless Earbuds
description: High-quality sound with active noise cancellation and 30-hour battery life. Perfect for music lovers and professionals on the go.

name: Ultra Comfort Running Shoes
description: Lightweight, durable shoes with enhanced cushioning for everyday running and training. Breathable mesh upper with responsive foam midsole.

name: Smart Fitness Watch
description: Track your health metrics, workouts, and sleep patterns. Water-resistant with a 7-day battery life and smartphone notifications.

name: Designer Leather Wallet
description: Genuine leather wallet with multiple card slots, bill compartment, and RFID blocking technology. Sleek and minimalist design.

name: Premium Coffee Maker
description: Programmable coffee maker with thermal carafe to keep your coffee hot for hours. Adjustable brew strength and auto-shutoff feature.

name: Organic Cotton T-shirt
description: Soft, breathable organic cotton t-shirt that's perfect for everyday wear. Sustainably made with eco-friendly dyes.

name: Professional DSLR Camera
description: High-resolution camera with advanced autofocus, 4K video recording, and interchangeable lenses. Perfect for photography enthusiasts.

name: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
description: Double-walled insulated bottle that keeps drinks cold for 24 hours or hot for 12 hours. Leak-proof and eco-friendly.

name: Wireless Gaming Mouse
description: Precision gaming mouse with customizable RGB lighting, programmable buttons, and ultra-low latency. Up to 60 hours of battery life.

name: Yoga Mat with Carrying Strap
description: Non-slip, eco-friendly yoga mat with alignment markings. Extra thick for joint protection and comes with a carrying strap.

name: Designer Sunglasses
description: Polarized sunglasses with UV protection and stylish frames. Lightweight and durable for everyday wear.

name: Portable Bluetooth Speaker
description: Waterproof speaker with immersive 360Â° sound and deep bass. 20-hour battery life and built-in microphone for calls.

name: Smart LED TV
description: 55-inch 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV with HDR support and built-in streaming apps. Crystal clear picture quality and immersive sound.

name: Leather Crossbody Bag
description: Stylish leather crossbody bag with adjustable strap and multiple compartments. Perfect for everyday use.

name: Smart Home Security Camera
description: 1080p HD wireless security camera with night vision and two-way audio. Easy setup and smartphone notifications.

name: Adjustable Dumbbell Set
description: Space-saving adjustable dumbbell set with weight range from 5-25kg. Perfect for home workouts.

name: Wireless Mechanical Keyboard
description: Premium mechanical keyboard with RGB backlighting and hot-swappable switches. Long battery life and ergonomic design.

name: Air Purifier
description: HEPA air purifier with activated carbon filter. Removes 99.97% of airborne particles and reduces odors.

name: Resistance Bands Set
description: Set of 5 resistance bands with different resistance levels. Includes carrying bag and exercise guide.

name: Smart Robot Vacuum
description: Wi-Fi enabled robot vacuum with mapping technology and automatic charging. Schedule cleaning from your smartphone.
